socketedItems.secDescrText: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that protects the lower half of your life, preventing some of the immediate life loss when damaged by hits and applying the loss over time instead. Life Recovery other than Flasks cannot Recover Life to above Low Life

socketedItems.secDescrText: Channel to project an illusion which you steer. You gain stages while it moves, until it stops at a maximum total distance.
